bulkblock-intro: Intro that's displayed on the Special page above form
bulkblock-no-usernames: Error message for no valid usernames provided
bulkblock-success: Success message with amount of users blocked
bulkblock-invalid-username: Error message telling the username is invalid
bulkblock-non-existing-username: Error message telling the user does not exists
bulkblock-already-blocked: Error message telling the user is already blocked
bulkblock-failed: Error message telling the user block failed
bulkblock-log-failed: Error message telling log recording failed
bulkblock-linkback: Text for link back to Special page
